mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Fremont, John C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excellency Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 19 1862. By Telegraph from Franklin 19 1862. Lieut Keenan Mustered in according to date first 1st Lieut Eighth 8 Va there are two 2 first Lieut vacancies & one captaincy Vacant in fifth 5 Va Lieut Col Morgan has resigned from the Second Lt. Peay[?] have them filled Immediately by competent men the Regts Should not be without their officers in Presence of Enemy I will attend to Col Loesers case today answer JC Fremont 63Gs262pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fremont, John C.
Franklin, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
